questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular layout and textual information presented, what is the primary function of this item, as visually apparent?

Based on the visual arrangement of the data, what is the unit of measurement consistently used for quantifying various nutritional components?
Focusing on the numerical values alongside each nutrient, what metric is employed to indicate the daily intake percentage of each listed component?
What is the color palette mainly used for the text on the label, differentiating it from the background and providing readability?
Examining the structure of the label, how many servings are indicated per container of the product described?
What specific unit is specified as the serving size of the food product described on the label?
Looking at the presented data, what is the total amount of calories per serving of the food product, as visually confirmed?
What is the major nutrient category that occupies the most significant portion of the presented label, judging by the visual space allocation?
Considering the text, what nutrient listed shows a percentage value higher than others indicating a more significant component?
What specific nutrient is labeled with a value of less than 1 gram, suggesting a relatively low quantity in the serving?
What macronutrient is listed prominently at the bottom of the label, and what is the amount indicated per serving?
What mineral is shown with a value of 150mg, signifying a notable concentration per serving, according to this visual data?

Disregarding the actual values, what is the general typographic style of the text used on the label, judging by its design and appearance?
